UPDATE amp_locator SET thegeometry = ST_PointFromText('POINT(' || longitude || ' ' || latitude || ')', 4326);@@@ CREATE INDEX idx_geoname_the_geom ON amp_locator USING gist(thegeometry);@@@
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_geometry_amp_locator() RETURNS TRIGGER AS $BODY$ declare dummy bigint; BEGIN UPDATE amp_locator SET thegeometry = ST_PointFromText('POINT(' || longitude || ' ' || latitude || ')', 4326) where id =(select max(id) from amp_locator); RETURN NULL; end; $BODY$ LANGUAGE plpgsql VOLATILE;@@@
CREATE TRIGGER trigger_geometry_amp_locator AFTER INSERT ON amp_locator EXECUTE PROCEDURE update_geometry_amp_locator();@@@
